3.title: Calvin Klein 'Eternity' After Shave 100ml
3.description:
Launched by the design house of Calvin Klein in 1989, ETERNITY is classified as a refreshing, spicy, lavender, amber fragrance. This masculine scent possesses a blend of greens, crisp jasmine, sage, basil, and rosewood. It is recommended for daytime wear.

Feel free to comment any questions you might have below.
